title: Jeb: 正在前往东京电玩节
author: pca006132
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2015-9-15 23:50 编辑 
On our way to Tokyo! Minecraft meetups and Tokyo Game Show* :) With @bopogamel and @jnkboy. (*I'm flying back Wednesday already)
Jeb:正前往东京！东京的Minecraft聚会及东京电玩节* :) 现在和bopogamel及jnkboy(他们两个也是Mojang的员工)一起 (*我星期三已经飞回去了)

replies.txt_content:
